section.p: The temple of Sig the Cunning, patron of vagabonds, troubadours, lovers, thieves and rogues, is a ramshackle warehouse in the poor quarter. Inside, however, there is so much wealth it makes you gasp - the idol of Sig, a saturnine two-faced young human of indeterminate sex, is covered in gems.
‘As you can see, we have been made rich by generous, er, donations!’ says a black-robed priest.

choices.choice: Seek an audience with the high priest
